src_original: svapnôpamā viṣayāḥ /  tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyā-  [ Cambridge MS f111b ---> ]  ṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
bhagavān āha /  tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
yaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyam anusmaret /  tayā vā sārdhaṃ krīḍitam abhiniveśet /
atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate /
anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /  yas tām abhiniviśet //
prathamavijñānaṃ prathamavijñānena śūnyaṃ /  cyutiś cyutyā śūnyā /
tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnântare śatruḥ /
tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /  yo 'sau svapnântare śatrum abhiniviśet /  śatruṇā vā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ /
